description: Set Automatic Purge. NOTE! this command will permanently delete all of the data which belongs to the published sessions not selected for preservation. In Multi-Domain Server, it should be done for each domain.

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Send JSON object to use the API Web Services

headers.name: X-chkp-sid
headers.description: Session unique identifier as it returned by the login request

body.name: ignore-domain-backup
body.description: Ignore global domain sessions that are linked to the latest local domain backups, and purge them anyway.

body.name: keep-sessions-by-count
body.description: Whether or not to keep the latest N sessions. Note: when the automatic purge feature is enabled, this field and/or the "keep-sessions-by-date" field must be set to 'true'.

body.name: number-of-sessions-to-keep
body.description: When "keep-sessions-by-count = true" this sets the number of newest sessions to preserve, by the sessions's publish date.

body.name: keep-sessions-by-days
body.description: Whether or not to keep the sessions for D days. Note: when the automatic purge feature is enabled, this field and/or the "keep-sessions-by-count" field must be set to 'true'.

body.name: number-of-days-to-keep
body.description: When "keep-sessions-by-days = true" this sets the number of days to keep the sessions.

body.name: start-date
body.description: The first time to check whether or not there are sessions to purge. ISO 8601. If timezone isn't specified in the input, the Management server's timezone is used. Instead - If you want to start immediately, type: "now". Note: when the automatic purge feature is enabled, this field must be set.

body.name: time-units
body.description: Note: when the automatic purge feature is enabled, this field must be set.

body.name: check-interval
body.description: Number of time-units between two purge checks. Note: when the automatic purge feature is enabled, this field must be set.

success.description: When "keep-sessions-by-days = true" this sets the number of days to keep the sessions.

set-automatic-purge by count.description: Schedule Automatic Purge to all sessions except the specified 10 newest sessions to preserve. The purge action will be executed every 3 weeks started from 2020-04-24 at 12:00:00
set-automatic-purge by count.request:
POST {{server}}/set-automatic-purge
Content-Type: application/json
X-chkp-sid: {{session}}

{
  "enabled" : true,
  "keep-sessions-by-days" : false,
  "number-of-sessions-to-keep" : "10",
  "scheduling.check-interval" : "21",
  "scheduling.time-units" : "days",
  "scheduling.start-date" : "2020-04-24T12:00:00"
}

set-automatic-purge by last period.description: Schedule Automatic Purge to all sessions except the newest sessions from last days (last 30 days) to preserve. The purge action will be executed every 5 days started from 2020-04-18 at 18:00:00
set-automatic-purge by last period.request:
POST {{server}}/set-automatic-purge
Content-Type: application/json
X-chkp-sid: {{session}}

{
  "enabled" : true,
  "keep-sessions-by-count" : false,
  "number-of-days-to-keep" : "30",
  "scheduling.check-interval" : "5",
  "scheduling.time-units" : "days",
  "scheduling.start-date" : "2020-04-18T18:00:00"
}
